Reviews.Title: “Pleasant enough and good for shopping and tourist attractions”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel package air malta maltese friends visiting uk booking deal little concerned reviews didn’t worry friends arrived uk spent pleasant nights london travelling stay brighton bad expected maltese friend found wife comfortable offered sufficient space luggage shopping adequate sleep visit offers basic requirements clean bathroom clean linen beds noise outside located towards rear london busy city expect hear background noise breakfast enjoyable optional english breakfast offered price alongside included continental breakfast mentioned visitors advantage cheaper prices uk europe shopping opportunity hotel located ideally shopping sightseeing staff helpful pleasant visitors complaints stay

Reviews.Title: “Small room”
Reviews.Author: GoMarshy
Reviews.Content: warned girl checkout offered basement front hotel road didnt expect double bed wall hotel located near british museum clean tidy hotel doesnt bar hotel door breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Weekend stay”
Reviews.Author: dave300
Reviews.Content: stayed portland nights wedding anniversary greeted door concierge late beaming smile friendly chap booking free upgrade executive fantastic hotel clean facilities expect ie tv internet access kitchenette fridge wasnt honest stay london dont stay hotel cook breakfast door sister hotels 20 steps complaints breakfast continental food fresh plentiful cooked breakfast available 24 pounds expensive nicely positioned amenities near transport links overall nice yes stay portland

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for business stays and for short breaks too”

Reviews.Content: time stayed hotel becasue usual hotel basement window road dark bed fabulous comfortable lots lovely pillows soft duvet little kitchenette cupboard breakfast hotel door worth lots choice smoked salmon meats cheese hot breakfast lovely lovely experience price extremely satified top receptionist staff polite helpful lovely

Reviews.Title: “Awful....says it all!”

Reviews.Content: hated minute stay hotel call hotel converted town house row converted townhouses didnt mind hotel quaint traditional features checkin fine staff overworked appearances polite friendly disgusting pay tiny bathroom barely move strange reason cupboard sink fridge microwave inside facilities toiletries coffee sugar tv towel hairdryer oh cheap nasty breakfast houses sister hotel dont fooled book online paying continental breakfast english english sister hotel road told pay extra opinion wasnt worth cheap ingredients stayed portland function evening day office itchy time couldnt wait home suitcase wash stay definitely cheapest london pay extra cleanliness shudder time

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice room but spoilt by poor sleep from noise”

Reviews.Content: 2nd hotel chain ive stayed position sight seeing west spacious clean building town house complaint noise length sash wood windows beautiful hopeless keeping street noise loud motorcycle outside midnight occassional vehicles kept awake guest walking lot floorboards creaking miserable night shame character hotels efforts chain portland value

Reviews.Title: “Unethical behavior from the hotel's management”
Reviews.Author: aboutlawrence
Reviews.Content: caught london middle volcanic ash crisis checked hotel monday evening following day decided extend stay night view demand london hotel increasing sharply hotel management decided charge night managed london hotel availing night notwithstanding management ready discount feel behaviour time crisis unprofessional unethical frequent traveler london am adamant boycott hotel chain future
